data.eml:eml: Identification, distribution, and adult phenology of the carrion beetles (Coleoptera: Silphidae) of Texas

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Mullins, Patricia L., Riley, Edward G., Oswald, John D. (2013): Identification, distribution, and adult phenology of the carrion beetles (Coleoptera: Silphidae) of Texas. Zootaxa 3666 (2): 221-251, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3666.2.7
